title: Carrots, Cauliflower And Almonds
summary: You can never have too many side dish recipes, so give Carrots, Cauliflower And Almonds a try. This recipe serves 1 and costs $2.08 per serving. One portion of this dish contains roughly 9g of protein, 58g of fat, and a total of 632 calories. 1 person found this recipe to be flavorful and satisfying. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. It is a good option if you're following a caveman, gluten free, primal, and whole 30 diet. A mixture of dressing: extra virgin olive oil, carrots, a quarter of a cauliflower, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so scrumptious. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 84%. This score is outstanding. Try Broccoli and Carrots with Toasted Almonds, Pan Roast Chicken with Carrots and Almonds, and Pan-Roasted Chicken with Carrots and Almonds for similar recipes.
